text: KPOM-LP was a low-power television station in Ontario, California, broadcasting locally in analog on VHF channel 6. Formerly based in the Palm Springs (Indio) area, it was an affiliate of Retro Television Network under KRET-LP channel 45. Founded August 23, 1989, the station is owned by Loop Media. It was a Spanish language Religious music channel, it's now an affiliate of ShopHQ (formerly Evine) with transmitter KDUO channel 43 for the Palm Springs area. == External links == * Category:Defunct terrestrial television stations in the United States Category:Indio, California POM-LP Category:Television channels and stations established in 1989 Category:1989 establishments in California Category:Television channels and stations disestablished in 2014 Category:2014 disestablishments in California POM-LP
title: KPOM-LP
